MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA7 postcode area of Ayr . It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.04pm to safely carry out repair work on our underground network on Carrick Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.30am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.06pm on the 1st of February 2021.
